> I have uploaded my translation of Saitou's family
> tree to 
> the "Photos" section! Of course, there are some
> names missing, but 
> those are the only ones that I wasn't able to read
> the kanji of 
> (since they were a bit difficult to decipher).

The ones I can help:

Sons of Saigo Chikashi:
- Yaeko (married to Takuemon)
- Youjirou (Yojiro)

Sons of Kinomoto Tokiko:
- Kuranojo

Sons of Takagi Shigemichi:
- Iso (married to Ariga Gonzaemon)

Sons of Takagi Morinosuke:
- Tochiko

Sons of Tsutomu and Midori:
- Tetsu (the leftmost one)
- Motoko (the rightmost one)

I don't know how to read Takagi Kozaemon's daughter's
name, but my guess is "Hisaka".

Serizawa Kamo
